Reviews.Title: “Good, clean hotel in Flushing downtown close to delicious eateries”
Reviews.Author: Katong
Reviews.Content: hotel decent sized 2 queen size beds located flushing downtown close nice chinese eateries 5 mins walk metro catch 7 train straight times sq macys flushing near metro bustling feel safe night corner hotel loong pao restaurant shanghai dumpling tasted asia restaurant packed service hotel minimal suits fine dont help luggage dont service clean bathroom receptionists helpful helped amend refundable booking free provide direction daughter fell sick breakfast bad continental boiled eggs waffle toasts cereals fresh fruits
